summary.span: 这是与相应的 COM 对象的互操作性的托管代码需要 COM coclass 中的主接口。

span.span: This is a primary interface in a COM coclass that is required by managed code for interoperability with the corresponding COM object.

summary.span: 仅当您想要使用的方法共享相同的名称的 COM 对象; 事件时，才使用此主接口在这种情况下，强制转换为此接口调用方法，并强制转换为最新的事件接口，连接到该事件。

span.span: Use this primary interface only when the method you want to use shares the same name as an event of the COM object; in this case, cast to this interface to call the method, and cast to the latest events interface to connect to the event.

summary.span: 否则，使用.NET 接口派生自 COM coclass 访问方法、 属性和事件的 COM 对象。

span.span: Otherwise, use the .NET interface that is derived from the COM coclass to access methods, properties, and events of the COM object.

summary.span: 有关 COM 对象的信息，请参阅。

span.span: For information about the COM object, see .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Application As Application

summary.span: 返回表示 Outlook application 对象的父对象。

span.span: Returns an object that represents the parent Outlook application for the object.

summary.span: 此为只读属性。

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AutoDiscoverConnectionMode As OlAutoDiscoverConnectionMode

summary.span: 返回指定的用于承载帐户邮箱的 Microsoft Exchange 服务器的自动发现服务的连接类型的常量。

span.span: Returns an constant that specifies the type of connection to use for the auto-discovery service of the Microsoft Exchange server that hosts the account mailbox.

summary.span: 此为只读属性。

span.span: Read-only.

para.span: 此属性是类似于属性对象，之处在于此属性适用于完成的自动发现的帐户和不一定是 Exchange 主帐户。

span.span: This property is similar to the property of the object, except that this property applies to the account for which auto-discovery is completed and not necessarily to the primary Exchange account.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AutoDiscoverXml As String
public: property System::String ^ AutoDiscoverXml { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 返回一个字符串（C# 中的字符串），表示 XML 中的信息检索从与该帐户相关联的 Microsoft Exchange Server 的自动发现服务。

span.span: Returns a String (string in C#) that represents information in XML retrieved from the auto-discovery service of the Microsoft Exchange Server that is associated with the account.

summary.span: 此为只读属性。

span.span: Read-only.

para.span: 此属性是类似于属性对象，之处在于此属性适用于完成的自动发现的帐户和不一定是 Exchange 主帐户。

span.span: This property is similar to the property of the object, except that this property applies to the account for which auto-discovery is completed and not necessarily to the primary Exchange account.

para.span: XML 的返回字符串包括有关各种 Web 服务（例如，可用性服务和统一邮件服务）和可用服务器的信息。

span.span: The returned string of XML contains information about various Web services (for example, availability service and unified messaging service) and available servers.

para.span: 如果该帐户不与运行 Microsoft Exchange Server 2007 或更高版本的 Exchange Server 关联，则返回错误。

span.span: An error is returned if the account is not associated with an Exchange Server that is running Microsoft Exchange Server 2007 or later.

span.span: Read-only.

para.span: 如果帐户没有默认传递存储区，则返回Nothing （中的空引用 (在 Visual Basic 中为 Nothing) C#）。

span.span: Returns Nothing (a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic) in C#) if the account does not have a default delivery store.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ExchangeConnectionMode As OlExchangeConnectionMode

summary.span: 返回常量，指示当前的连接模式承载帐户邮箱的 Microsoft Exchange 服务器。

span.span: Returns an constant that indicates the current connection mode for the Microsoft Exchange Server that hosts the account mailbox.

summary.span: 只读

span.span: Read-only

para.span: 此属性是类似于属性对象，之处在于此属性适用于 Exchange Server 承载帐户邮箱，以及不一定是 Exchange 主帐户。

span.span: This property is similar to the property of the object, except that this property applies to the Exchange Server that hosts the account mailbox, and not necessarily to the primary Exchange account.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ExchangeMailboxServerName As String
public: property System::String ^ ExchangeMailboxServerName { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 返回一个表示承载帐户邮箱的 Microsoft Exchange 服务器的名称的字符串（C# 中的字符串） 值。

span.span: Returns a String (string in C#) value that represents the name of the Microsoft Exchange Server that hosts the account mailbox.

summary.span: 此为只读属性。

span.span: Read-only.

para.span: 此属性是类似于属性对象，之处在于此属性适用于 Exchange Server 承载帐户邮箱，以及不一定是 Exchange 主帐户。

span.span: This property is similar to the property of the object, except that this property applies to the Exchange Server that hosts the account mailbox, and not necessarily to the primary Exchange account.

para.span: 如果 Exchange 邮箱不与该帐户相关联，则此属性返回一个空字符串。

span.span: If an Exchange mailbox is not associated with this account, this property returns an empty string.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ExchangeMailboxServerVersion As String
public: property System::String ^ ExchangeMailboxServerVersion { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 返回一个字符串（C# 中的字符串），表示承载帐户邮箱的 Microsoft Exchange 服务器的完整版本号。

span.span: Returns a String (string in C#) that represents the full version number of the Microsoft Exchange Server that hosts the account mailbox.

summary.span: 此为只读属性。

span.span: Read-only.

para.span: 此属性是类似于属性对象，之处在于此属性适用于 Exchange Server 承载帐户邮箱，以及不一定是 Exchange 主帐户。

span.span: This property is similar to the property of the object, except that this property applies to the Exchange Server that hosts the account mailbox, and not necessarily to the primary Exchange account.

para.span: 此属性返回一个字符串，该字符串包含帐户的 Exchange 服务器的版本号。

span.span: This property returns a string that contains the version number of the Exchange server for the account.

para.span: 版本号包含以下四个部分：

span.span: The version number has the following four parts:

para.span: <主要版本>。<次要版本>。<内部版本号>。<修订>

span.span: <major version>.<minor version>.<build number>.<revision>

para.span: 并非所有部分都会在版本号中出现，具体取决于 Exchange Server 提供的版本信息。例如，对于 Microsoft Exchange Server 2003 Service Pack 2，此属性返回"6.5.7638"。

span.span: Not all parts may be present in the version number, depending on the version information that is supplied by the Exchange Server. For example, this property returns "6.5.7638" for Microsoft Exchange Server 2003 Service Pack 2.

para.span: 如果 Exchange 邮箱不与该帐户相关联，则此属性返回一个空字符串。

span.span: If an Exchange mailbox is not associated with this account, this property returns an empty string.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook.AddressEntry GetAddressEntryFromID([in]string ID) runtime managed
Public Function GetAddressEntryFromID (ID As String) As AddressEntry

param.name: ID
param.span: 用于标识为会话维护的地址条目。

span.span: Used to identify an address entry that is maintained for the session.

summary.span: 返回对象，表示由给定的条目 ID 指定的地址条目。

span.span: Returns an object that represents the address entry specified by the given entry ID.

returns.span: 返回AddressEntry已匹配指定的属性。

span.span: Returns an AddressEntry that has the property that matches the specified .

para.span: 此方法类似于是方法对象，但具有一些有关要用于查找的帐户的其他上下文信息。

span.span: This method is similar to the method of the object, but has some additional contextual information about which account to use for the look-up.

para.span: 如果在当前配置文件中存在多个 Microsoft Exchange 帐户，使用 GetAddressEntryFromID 方法相应帐户。

span.span: If there are multiple Microsoft Exchange accounts in the current profile, use the GetAddressEntryFromID method for the corresponding account.

para.span: AddressEntry 的 ID 属性是传输提供程序在创建 AddressEntry 时，分配一个永久且唯一的字符串标识符。 Outlook 针对会话维护通讯簿层次结构，所返回的地址条目必须与给定的 ID 相匹配而且必须在某个通讯簿。

span.span: The ID property for an AddressEntry is a permanent, unique string identifier that the transport provider assigns when an AddressEntry is created. Outlook maintains a hierarchy of address books for a session, and the address entry that is returned must match the given ID and be in one of the address books.

para.span: 如果可以不找到具有给定 ID 的任何项，如果没有连接可用，或者如果用户设置为脱机工作，则 GetAddressEntryFromID 将返回错误。

span.span: GetAddressEntryFromID returns an error if no item with the given ID can be found, if no connection is available, or if the user is set to work offline.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook.Recipient GetRecipientFromID([in]string EntryID) runtime managed
Public Function GetRecipientFromID (EntryID As String) As Recipient

span.span: The of the recipient.

summary.span: 返回由给定的条目 ID 标识的对象

span.span: Returns the object that is identified by the given entry ID.

returns.span: 返回一个值，该值代表指定的条目 ID 相关联的收件人的Recipient对象

span.span: Returns a Recipient object that represents the recipient associated with the specified entry ID.

para.span: 此方法类似于是方法对象。

span.span: This method is similar to the method of the object.

para.span: 如果在当前配置文件中存在多个 Microsoft Exchange 帐户，使用 GetRecipientFromID 方法相应帐户。

span.span: If there are multiple Microsoft Exchange accounts in the current profile, use the GetRecipientFromID method for the corresponding account.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SmtpAddress As String
public: property System::String ^ SmtpAddress { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 返回一个字符串（C# 中的字符串） 表示的简单邮件传输协议 (SMTP) 地址。

span.span: Returns a String (string in C#) representing the Simple Mail Transfer Protocol (SMTP) address for the .

summary.span: 此为只读属性。

span.span: Read-only.

para.span: SmtpAddress的用途和是提供来确定标识的基于帐户的上下文。

span.span: The purpose of SmtpAddress and is to provide an account-based context to determine identity.

para.span: 如果该帐户不具有 SMTP 地址，则 SmtpAddress 将返回一个空字符串。

span.span: If the account does not have an SMTP address, SmtpAddress returns an empty string.

public: property System::String ^ UserName { System::String ^ get(); };

span.span: Returns a String (string in C#) representing the user name for the .

summary.span: 此为只读属性。

span.span: Read-only.

para.span: 用途的和UserName旨在提供来确定标识的基于帐户的上下文。

span.span: The purpose of and UserName is to provide an account-based context to determine identity.

para.span: 如果该帐户没有定义的用户名称， 用户名 将返回一个空字符串。

span.span: If the account does not have a user name defined, UserName returns an empty string.
